name: Find Me a Secret Room
description:
Find Me a Secret Room is a roguelike puzzle fangame based on  the game The Binding of Isaac.

The game  requires you to find and unlock various secret rooms hidden around randomly generated levels. 
As you go levels will increase in difficulty, so it won't be easy, but don't worry, you can collect  different items along the way to help you succeed. 

For the first time playing it's recommended that you play through Tutorial first.

Credits:
Music by: alkakrab
UI by: Humble Pixel

Want to reach me?

More updates to come (hopefully),  so if you enjoyed the game or have something you want me to add/fix feel free to reach out to me or post your suggestions here.

Hope you enjoy!
